name: Train Simulator: EWS & Freightliner Class 08s Loco Add-On
summary: Once one of the most common sights on the British railway network, the Class 08 diesel shunter is now available for Train Simulator in the modern EWS and Freightliner liveries. The Class 08 was the 'go to' locomotive for general purpose duties, with almost any shunting required in yards and at stations carried out by a 'Gronk'.
